ygData.subject: Re: Stein - No more - Addendum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If any type of Mage has 2500pp to drop on two items, I don t think money is a major concern.  How do you fight with a Stien anyway?  Is it a new melee
ygData.messageBody:
HiFi Review wrote:

> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> The real complaint is that I know players who have spent 500p or more
> on a sacrificial dagger for the melee hand and 2000p for the mug. now
> they've wasted money they could have spent elsewhere. I have no
> concern about the quest being made more difficult. they should do
> that, indeed. Changing the nature of an object people have spent their
> entire fortunes on is unfair and will lead to many outraged players.

If any type of Mage has 2500pp to drop on two items, I don't think money is
a major concern. How do you fight with a Stien anyway? Is it a new melee
catagory? I can see the message now "Your skill in Bar Room Brawls has
increased (36)"
